title: How to pin search folder to top of folder pane
content: For years I had a search folder at the top of my folder pane. I forget where it was exactly but it was no more than 3rd from the top, possibly under "Inbox". Today it somehow disappeared. So I've re-created the search folder, but now it's in alphabetical position, which puts it near the bottom. I know I can rename it with something like "aaa" to move it up, but is there another way? I tried marking it as a Favorite, but the Favorite Folder pane just appears at the bottom - so no help. I'm using v. 128.7.1 esr 64 bit.

title: TWC mail support in Thunderbird
content: I have been a Thunderbird user forever. LOVE it !!! I used to have 2 email accounts underneath Thunderbird: TWC mail and Gmail. Every account worked great sending/receiving up until Feb 12. Then my TWC mail stopped replicating. Gmail account still works. Called TWC and was informed that I had to update my Master Password for my Spectrum Account. Worked with Tech Support to get me all re-established. Went into Thunderbird and still couldn't replicate. Found an answer dated 1/26/25 by teknikal at 10:44 on this Forum which sounded like exactly my problem. Called Spectrum every day trying to find the Server Engineer who could help me reset my password to no avail. Then i investigated updating my new password in the saved password of the account setting. There was only a saved password for TWC for SMTP which I updated and was able to successfully send and email from TWC to Gmail under Thunderbird. But I still can not receive emails and there is NO saved password for IMAP. So I did further reading and found my only alternative was to delete TWC from Thunderbird and re-add the account. Which I tried to do. But the configuration that replicated was mobile.charter.net which I manually changed to mail.twc.com but Thunderbird keeps telling me it can't find the server. I just got off the phone with Spectrum and my config is accurate: smtp mail.twc.com 587 starttls normal password chrismcm@twcny.rr.com imap mail.twc.com 993 starttls normal password chrismcm@twcny.rr.com Why isn't Thunderbird configuring my mail server so that I can send and receive emails ??? And now have I lost all my mail and folders since I deleted my account only to re-add it ??? I'm ready for the looney bin because I have been at this for DAYS !!! Please HELP !!! Thank you.
creator: chrismcm1081

title: How do you resize the main window of Thunderbird
content:
I understand how to resize the panels and arrange the view, but how do you expand the overall main window that contains everything to give you more landscape to expand the panels within the window?

Thanks. It may be in here, but I couldn't find it easily.
creator: dm_corsa

title: Keeping Thunderbird running in the background on Linux
content:
I am new to Thunderbird. I have gotten fed up with Kmail in KDE for Linux, it is basically useless since it does not allow any of the modern login protocols required by MS and Google.

One thing Kmail did do, was start in the background so it was always periodically checking for mail and indicating new messages in the icon and notification in the desktop toolbar. So you didn't have to have it running in the foreground as a running application.

How can you do that with Thunderbird? I tried an experiment by closing Thunderbird down and sending emails to accounts I have setup but no notifications appeared until I restarted the app in the foreground.

Thanks
creator: dm_corsa

title: Disappearing folders and Not Responding notice appearing
content:
Hello Community Members:

I seem to be having issues with Thunderbird. I’ve been using Thunderbird for years with no problems. A few weeks ago, I started getting a Not Responding notice when checking mail. I have a number of accounts to check. The Not Responding notice would disappear after a few seconds and the mail checking continued. Along with this issue, several of my folders would disappear only to reappear after Thunderbird was closed and then restarted. Today, all of the folders in one of my accounts disappeared and never reappeared. That account had 15-20 folders. I may have lost important correspondence. Does anyone know what’s going on and how to fix it?

Thanks for any assistance.

Jason
creator: tigerstime

title: Thunderbird et la Confirmation de lecture
content:
Bonjour, Sur mac OS, je configure la demande de "confirmation de lecture", et selon le destinataire je reçois ou non la notification de lecture. Ainsi les adresse "@free.fr", ne me retourne pas la confirmation, elle n'est même pas demandée au destinataire. Il y a t'il une configuration spécifique à effectuer?

Merci pour l'aide.

Hello, On mac OS, I configure the “read confirmation” request, and depending on the recipient I receive or not the read notification. For example, “@free.fr” addresses don't send me the confirmation, and the recipient isn't even asked for it. Is there a specific configuration to be made?

Thanks for any help.

title: Reading pane for emails?
content:
(Only just started with Thunderbird - I can get no sensible answers from MS about New Outlook being made fit to use. T'bird was amazingly easy to set up.)

I've got email running fine, but is it possible to open a reading pane to review new emails before opening them, please? It'd be useful to identify scammers without opening an item. GMail doesn't have a reading pane, but Classic Outlook does.

Best wishes Andy Banks
creator: andy.banks802

title: Colour marking of events in the calendar
content:
Only just started with Thunderbird, so hope this isn't a daft question...

Am now setting up events in the calendar. I can see how to tag events for a wide range of categories (too many perhaps), but is it possible to highlight events in different colours, please?

Outlook doesn't let you do this, but the Google calendar lets you mark them up in different block colours - v useful for showing at a glance which family members are involved in which events - a bit like the old-style office wall planners.

Lookng forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes Andy Banks
creator: andy.banks802

title: Thunderbird e-posta hataları\ Thunderbird email errors
content:
Mail atarken imza olarak bir jpeg dosyası oluşturdum ve bu jpeg dosyasını imza olarak kaydettim. Bu dosya mail attığım zaman karşı tarafa hem metnin altında hem de ek dosya olarak gidiyor. Bunu nasıl çözebilirim.

Bir de e-posta gönderirken ekte resmini paylaştığım hatayı veriyor. Bunu nasıl çözebilirim.

Kolay gelsin.

- - - - - - --

When sending an e-mail, I created a jpeg file as a signature and saved this jpeg file as a signature. When I send an e-mail, this file is sent to the other party both under the text and as an attachment. How can I solve this?

Also, when sending an e-mail, it gives the error whose picture I have attached. How can I solve this?

Have a nice day
